name: Aptonoth
description: Herbívoros dóceis que pastam em bandos. Sua carne é considerada uma iguaria e rica em nutrientes. Se um membro do rebanho for atacado, os demais fugirão imediatamente.

item.name: Raw Meat
item.description: Meat carved from a monster. Can be cooked, combined, or used to set a trap.

name: Jagras
description: Membros da matilha dos Grandes Jagras, esses monstros menores fugirão ao ver um deles morrer. Eles também são conhecidos por emboscar monstros maiores a qualquer momento.

name: Mernos
description: Wingdrakes que se alimentam de nozes dispersas. O rebanho percorrerá grandes distâncias quando assustado, o que os torna um meio de transporte inestimável para caçadores inteligentes.

name: Vespoid
description: Insetos que paralisam seus alvos com seus longos ferrões. Eles quebram facilmente, então ataque-os com veneno ou munição de lançador se quiser esculpi-los.

ailments.name: Paralysis
ailments.description: Paralysis renders the hunter or monster immobilized and susceptible to increased damage for the duration. Hunters can unparalyzed if they are hit.

name: Mosswine
description: Os Mosswine são conhecidos por seu excelente olfato e são frequentemente encontrados em busca de fungos. Se você estiver caçando cogumelos, siga o Mosswine até o filão principal.

name: Apceros
description: Herbívoros que habitam Wildspire Waste. Eles desenvolveram uma pele particularmente dura para afastar os atacantes e são conhecidos por se reunirem em grupos para se defenderem.

item.name: Raw Meat
item.description: Meat carved from a monster. Can be cooked, combined, or used to set a trap.

name: Kestodon
description: A fêmea Kestodon alertará a matilha sobre o perigo, enquanto os machos atacarão violentamente possíveis ameaças. No entanto, suas investidas rápidas podem ser bloqueadas, deixando-os vulneráveis ​​a ataques.

name: Noios
description: Wingdrakes que produzem um som semelhante ao de gritos quando assustados. Use carne para chamar a atenção deles e, em seguida, cace-os em busca de materiais ou use-os para transporte.

name: Gajau
description: Piscinas cruéis que formam grupos para defender seu território de intrusos. Certifique-se de não se aventurar muito perto de seu habitat!

name: Kelbi
description: Pequenos herbívoros conhecidos por seu comportamento gentil e pelas propriedades medicinais de seus chifres. Aqueles que desejam colher um chifre devem mirar na cabeça ao atacá-los.

name: Raphinos
description: Wingdrakes habitando as Terras Altas de Coral. Eles se agrupam para roubar ovos de outros animais, mas isso, por sua vez, os expõe à atenção de predadores maiores e mais cruéis.

name: Shamos
description: Pequenos monstros noturnos. Eles são particularmente vulneráveis ​​ao clarão ofuscante de Tzitzi-Ya-Ku, mas são conhecidos por se unirem contra os inimigos.

name: Girros
description: Monstros conhecidos por atacar em bandos, usando o vapor mortal do Vale Podre a seu favor. Eles são conhecidos por paralisar alvos com presas paralisantes.

ailments.name: Paralysis
ailments.description: Paralysis renders the hunter or monster immobilized and susceptible to increased damage for the duration. Hunters can unparalyzed if they are hit.

name: Hornetaur
description: Pequenos insetos encontrados principalmente em terra. Eles são altamente territoriais e atacarão qualquer coisa que se aproxime deles. Reúna seus materiais atacando-os com o lançador.

name: Gastodon
description: Reúna monstros que habitam o Recesso do Ancião. Eles se irritam facilmente com intrusos e atacarão monstros com o dobro do seu tamanho.

name: Barnos
description: Dragões alados fervorosos que floresceram sob duras condições de vida. Eles atacam os intrusos com um agente ácido único e depois atacam como um enxame.

ailments.name: Defense Down
ailments.description: Some monsters may inflict a status that lowers a hunter's defense. Lasts for a certain period of time but can also be cured with defense-increasing items.

items.name: Armorskin
items.description: Boosts your defense by turning your skin as hard as rock.

items.name: Mega Armorskin
items.description: Boosts your defense even more than a regular armorskin.

item.name: Nulberry
item.description: A mysterious berry that cures various blights.

item.name: Raw Meat
item.description: Meat carved from a monster. Can be cooked, combined, or used to set a trap.

item.name: Sturdy Bone
item.description: A bone used as crafting material. Can be found in bonepiles in the Coral Highlands and Rotten Vale.

item.name: Monster Bone S
item.description: A material found in bonepiles. Indispensable for both hunting and daily life.

item.name: Wingdrake Hide
item.description: A material carved from wingdrakes. Lightweight and often used when crafting armor.

item.name: Barnos Hide+
item.description: Rare Barnos material. Obtained by carving. Supple, used to craft gear.

item.name: Barnos Talon
item.description: Rare Barnos material. Obtained by carving. Unusual, used in select gear.

name: Great Jagras
description: O líder da matilha dos Jagras. Quando estão com fome, os Grandes Jagras são conhecidos por atacar monstros ainda mais fortes do que eles. Ele incha em proporções inacreditáveis ​​depois de engolir uma presa.

name: Kulu-Ya-Ku
description: Um estranho pássaro wyvern que desenvolveu membros capazes de carregar armas. Ele foi flagrado roubando ovos de ninhos encontrados na Floresta Antiga e no Ermo Wildspire.

name: Pukei-Pukei
description: Um pássaro wyvern conhecido por possuir toxinas venenosas em seu corpo. Ele foi flagrado armazenando nozes na boca ou na cauda, ​​cobrindo-as com veneno e cuspindo-as diante de ameaças.

ailments.name: Poison
ailments.description: Poison slowly drains the target's health.

items.name: Antidote
items.description: A cure for poison.

items.name: Herbal Medicine
items.description: Removes all traces of poison and restores a slight amount of health.

ailments.name: Stun
ailments.description: Stun renders the target inactive, and sometimes causes them to fall over.

name: Barroth
description: Barroth procura formigas, seu lanche preferido, e marca seu território com lama. Eles atacam rivais em potencial com seu ataque devastador.

ailments.name: Waterblight
ailments.description: Waterblight slows down stamina recovery rate.

items.name: Nulberry
items.description: A mysterious berry that cures various blights.

ailments.name: Muddy
ailments.description: A status effect inflicted when mud thrown by a monster covers the Hunter and makes movement more difficult. Slows all actions until the hunter leaves the mud.

item.name: Monster Bone M
item.description: Bone obtained from large monsters. Strong yet flexible, it's as reliable as steel or wood.

item.name: Monster Keenbone
item.description: Bone obtained from high rank large monsters. It has a razor-sharp tip that retains its strength after forging.

item.name: Wyvern Gem
item.description: Throughout a wyvern's life, impurities gather and form this peculiar gem.

item.name: Barroth Shell
item.description: Barroth material. Mostly obtained by carving. Broadly used for many purposes.

item.name: Barroth Ridge
item.description: Barroth material. Mostly obtained as a reward. Solid, used to craft gear.

item.name: Barroth Claw
item.description: Barroth material. Obtained by breaking its forelimbs. Hardy, used in many weapons.

item.name: Barroth Scalp
item.description: Barroth material. Obtained by breaking its head. Tough, used in many weapons.

item.name: Barroth Tail
item.description: Barroth material. Obtained by carving its severed tail. Stiff, used to craft gear.

item.name: Fertile Mud
item.description: Barroth material. Obtained by breaking its mud covering. Unusual, used in select gear.

item.name: Barroth Carapace
item.description: Rare Barroth material. Mostly obtained by carving. Broadly used for many purposes.

item.name: Barroth Ridge+
item.description: Rare Barroth material. Mostly obtained as a reward. Solid, used to craft gear.

item.name: Barroth Claw+
item.description: Rare Barroth material. Obtained by breaking its forelimbs. Hardy, used in many weapons.

item.name: Wyvern Tear
item.description: Bitter tears wept by wyverns on certain occasions. (Account Item)

name: Jyuratodus
description: Um grande wyvern piscino que habita os pântanos de Wildspire Waste. Ele usa lama para capturar presas e é conhecido por lutar contra Barroth por território.

ailments.name: Waterblight
ailments.description: Waterblight slows down stamina recovery rate.

items.name: Nulberry
items.description: A mysterious berry that cures various blights.

ailments.name: Muddy
ailments.description: A status effect inflicted when mud thrown by a monster covers the Hunter and makes movement more difficult. Slows all actions until the hunter leaves the mud.

name: Tobi-Kadachi
description: Um wyvern com presas que voa entre as árvores da Floresta Antiga. Sua tendência de roçar o chão e as árvores enquanto se move acumula eletricidade estática em seu pelo.

ailments.name: Thunderblight
ailments.description: Thunderblight increases the chance of being stunned.

items.name: Nulberry
items.description: A mysterious berry that cures various blights.

name: Anjanath
description: O Anjanath patrulha a Floresta Antiga em busca de sua refeição favorita, Aptonoth. Este monstro beligerante atacará qualquer coisa sem hesitação.

ailments.name: Fireblight
ailments.description: Fireblight causes damage over time, and negates regular health recovery.

items.name: Nulberry
items.description: A mysterious berry that cures various blights.

item.name: Monster Bone L
item.description: Bone obtained from large monsters. Hard to work with due to its size, but vital when crafting larger items.

item.name: Monster Keenbone
item.description: Bone obtained from high rank large monsters. It has a razor-sharp tip that retains its strength after forging.

item.name: Flame Sac
item.description: A monster organ filled with flammable powder. Handle with extreme care.

item.name: Inferno Sac
item.description: A monster organ filled with powder that ignites if it so much as touches air. Danger!

item.name: Anjanath Scale
item.description: Anjanath material. Mostly obtained by carving. Broadly used for many purposes.

item.name: Anjanath Pelt
item.description: Anjanath material. Mostly obtained as a reward. Highly heat-resistant, used to craft gear.

item.name: Anjanath Fang
item.description: Anjanath material. Obtained by breaking its head. Sharp, used in many weapons.

item.name: Anjanath Nosebone
item.description: Anjanath material. Obtained by breaking its head. Unusual and difficult to handle.

item.name: Anjanath Tail
item.description: Anjanath material. Obtained by carving its severed tail. Stiff, used to craft gear.

item.name: Anjanath Plate
item.description: Anjanath material. A valuable find, used to fortify gear. Said to be quite hard to come by.

item.name: Anjanath Scale+
item.description: Rare Anjanath material. Mostly obtained by carving. Broadly used for many purposes.

item.name: Anjanath Pelt+
item.description: Rare Anjanath material. Mostly obtained as a reward. Highly heat-resistant, used to craft gear.

item.name: Anjanath Fang+
item.description: Rare Anjanath material. Obtained by breaking its head. Sharp, used in many weapons.

item.name: Anjanath Nosebone+
item.description: Rare Anjanath material. Obtained by breaking its head. Unusual and difficult to handle.

item.name: Anjanath Gem
item.description: A rare gem said to have formed within Anjanath tissue. Used to dramatically improve gear.

item.name: Wyvern Tear
item.description: Bitter tears wept by wyverns on certain occasions. (Account Item)

name: Azure Rathalos
description: Uma subespécie de Rathalos de cor azul. Mais móveis do que seus primos padrão, eles localizam a presa no ar e rapidamente se lançam para matá-la.

ailments.name: Fireblight
ailments.description: Fireblight causes damage over time, and negates regular health recovery.

items.name: Nulberry
items.description: A mysterious berry that cures various blights.

ailments.name: Poison
ailments.description: Poison slowly drains the target's health.

items.name: Antidote
items.description: A cure for poison.

items.name: Herbal Medicine
items.description: Removes all traces of poison and restores a slight amount of health.

item.name: Monster Hardbone
item.description: Precious bone obtained from high rank large monsters. Their rarity makes them highly sought after.

item.name: Inferno Sac
item.description: A monster organ filled with powder that ignites if it so much as touches air. Danger!

item.name: Rath Wingtalon
item.description: Material from Rathian and Rathalos. Obtained by breaking its wings. Sharp, used in many weapons.

item.name: Rathalos Plate
item.description: Rathalos material. A valuable find, used to fortify gear. Said to be quite hard to come by.

item.name: Rathalos Medulla
item.description: Rare Rathalos material. Obtained by carving. Grants fire element properties.

item.name: Rathalos Ruby
item.description: A rare gem said to have formed within Rathalos tissue. Almost too nice to use.

item.name: Azure Rathalos Scale+
item.description: Rare Azure Rathalos material. Mostly obtained by carving. Broadly used for many purposes.

item.name: Azure Rathalos Carapace
item.description: Rare Azure Rathalos material. Mostly obtained as a reward. Solid, used to craft gear.

item.name: Azure Rathalos Tail
item.description: Rare Azure Rathalos material. Obtained by carving its severed tail. Compatible with fire element.

item.name: Azure Rathalos Wing
item.description: Rare Azure Rathalos material. Obtained by breaking its wings. Supple, used to craft gear.

item.name: Large Wyvern Tear
item.description: Large, bitter tears wept by wyverns on certain occasions. (Account Item)

name: Bazelgeuse
description: Um nefasto wyvern voador que viaja pelo Novo Mundo em busca de presas. Ele espalha escamas explosivas por uma ampla área para atacar tudo o que for pego pela explosão.

ailments.name: Blastblight
ailments.description: Blastblight will cause a damaging explosion after a certain amount of time has passed, or upon sustaining a heavy impact.

ailments.name: Fireblight
ailments.description: Fireblight causes damage over time, and negates regular health recovery.

items.name: Nulberry
items.description: A mysterious berry that cures various blights.

item.name: Monster Hardbone
item.description: Precious bone obtained from high rank large monsters. Their rarity makes them highly sought after.

item.name: Bazelgeuse Scale+
item.description: Rare Bazelgeuse material. Mostly obtained by carving. Broadly used for many purposes.

item.name: Bazelgeuse Carapace
item.description: Rare Bazelgeuse material. Mostly obtained as a reward. Solid, used to craft gear.

item.name: Bazelgeuse Tail
item.description: Rare Bazelgeuse material. Obtained by carving its severed tail. Stiff, used to craft gear.

item.name: Bazelgeuse Fuse
item.description: Rare Bazelgeuse material. Obtained by breaking its head. Grants blast element properties.

item.name: Bazelgeuse Talon
item.description: Rare Bazelgeuse material. Mostly obtained by carving. Compatible with blast element.

item.name: Bazelgeuse Wing
item.description: Rare Bazelgeuse material. Obtained by breaking its wings. Hard, used in many weapons.

item.name: Bazelgeuse Gem
item.description: A rare gem said to have formed within Bazelgeuse tissue. Used to dramatically improve gear.

item.name: Large Wyvern Tear
item.description: Large, bitter tears wept by wyverns on certain occasions. (Account Item)

name: Behemoth
description: Uma fera poderosa de outro mundo. Seus grandes chifres e estrutura musculosa desafiam a natureza. Estratégias únicas são necessárias para combatê-lo.

ailments.name: Bleeding
ailments.description: Bleeding causes damage when performing certain actions, such as running, dodging, or attacking.

items.name: Well-done Steak
items.description: Provides a moderate boost to your stamina and keeps it at max for a longer period. Meat done right!

items.name: Astera Jerky
items.description: Juicy, dried meat made by Astera's chef. Boosts natural healing and cures bleeding.

items.name: Sushifish Scale
items.description: A scale from a Sushifish. Eat to restore a small amount of health. Also works to treat bleeding.

ailments.name: Fireblight
ailments.description: Fireblight causes damage over time, and negates regular health recovery.

items.name: Nulberry
items.description: A mysterious berry that cures various blights.

ailments.name: Thunderblight
ailments.description: Thunderblight increases the chance of being stunned.

items.name: Nulberry
items.description: A mysterious berry that cures various blights.

name: Deviljho
description: Um monstro que deve se alimentar constantemente e devorará qualquer coisa em seu caminho, alimentando-se até mesmo do maior dos monstros com sua enorme papada.

ailments.name: Dragonblight
ailments.description: Dragonblight causes your weapon's elemental properties are nullified.

items.name: Nulberry
items.description: A mysterious berry that cures various blights.

ailments.name: Defense Down
ailments.description: Some monsters may inflict a status that lowers a hunter's defense. Lasts for a certain period of time but can also be cured with defense-increasing items.

items.name: Armorskin
items.description: Boosts your defense by turning your skin as hard as rock.

items.name: Mega Armorskin
items.description: Boosts your defense even more than a regular armorskin.

name: Diablos
description:
O monstro máximo de Wildspire Waste.
Uma fera territorial ameaçadora que se esconde no subsolo.
Ruídos altos farão com que ele saia da areia em busca de uma presa.

ailments.name: Stun
ailments.description: Stun renders the target inactive, and sometimes causes them to fall over.

item.name: Dash Extract
item.description: A mysterious substance culled from certain monsters that increases endurance.

item.name: Monster Bone+
item.description: Bone obtained from large monsters. Hard to obtain, but vital for crafting powerful equipment.

item.name: Monster Hardbone
item.description: Precious bone obtained from high rank large monsters. Their rarity makes them highly sought after.

item.name: Wyvern Gem
item.description: Throughout a wyvern's life, impurities gather and form this peculiar gem.

item.name: Diablos Shell
item.description: Diablos material. Mostly obtained by carving. Broadly used for many purposes.

item.name: Diablos Ridge
item.description: Diablos material. Mostly obtained as a reward. Solid, used to craft gear.

item.name: Diablos Tailcase
item.description: Diablos material. Obtained by carving its severed tail. Sturdy, but difficult to handle.

item.name: Diablos Fang
item.description: Diablos material. Mostly obtained by carving. Sharp, used in many weapons.

item.name: Twisted Horn
item.description: Diablos material. Obtained by breaking its horns. Stout, used in many weapons.

item.name: Diablos Marrow
item.description: Diablos material. A valuable find, used to fortify gear. Said to be quite hard to come by.

item.name: Diablos Carapace
item.description: Rare Diablos material. Mostly obtained by carving. Broadly used for many purposes.

item.name: Diablos Ridge+
item.description: Rare Diablos material. Mostly obtained as a reward. Solid, used to craft gear.

item.name: Majestic Horn
item.description: Rare Diablos material. Obtained by breaking its horns. Stout, used in many weapons.

item.name: Wyvern Tear
item.description: Bitter tears wept by wyverns on certain occasions. (Account Item)

name: Black Diablos
description: Esses Diablos de casca preta são, na verdade, Diablos fêmeas no cio. A cor sinaliza sua agressividade e maior hostilidade a outras criaturas em seu habitat.

item.name: Dash Extract
item.description: A mysterious substance culled from certain monsters that increases endurance.

item.name: Monster Hardbone
item.description: Precious bone obtained from high rank large monsters. Their rarity makes them highly sought after.

item.name: Wyvern Gem
item.description: Throughout a wyvern's life, impurities gather and form this peculiar gem.

item.name: Diablos Tailcase
item.description: Diablos material. Obtained by carving its severed tail. Sturdy, but difficult to handle.

item.name: Diablos Fang
item.description: Diablos material. Mostly obtained by carving. Sharp, used in many weapons.

item.name: Twisted Horn
item.description: Diablos material. Obtained by breaking its horns. Stout, used in many weapons.

item.name: Diablos Marrow
item.description: Diablos material. A valuable find, used to fortify gear. Said to be quite hard to come by.

item.name: Blos Medulla
item.description: Rare Diablos material. A valuable find, used to fortify gear. Said to be quite hard to come by.

item.name: Black Diablos Carapace
item.description: Rare Black Diablos material. Mostly obtained by carving. Broadly used for many purposes.

item.name: Black Diablos Ridge+
item.description: Rare Black Diablos material. Mostly obtained as a reward. Solid, used to craft gear.

item.name: Black Spiral Horn+
item.description: Rare Black Diablos material. Obtained by breaking its horns. Stout, used in many weapons.

item.name: Large Wyvern Tear
item.description: Large, bitter tears wept by wyverns on certain occasions. (Account Item)

name: Dodogama
description: Um monstro que devora rocha como dieta principal. Os cristais que ele devora misturam-se com sua saliva para produzir minerais explosivos que ele pode cuspir em seus inimigos.

ailments.name: Blastblight
ailments.description: Blastblight will cause a damaging explosion after a certain amount of time has passed, or upon sustaining a heavy impact.

item.name: Nourishing Extract
item.description: Can be obtained from certain large monsters. Has the ability to amplify the effects of certain medicines.

item.name: Monster Keenbone
item.description: Bone obtained from high rank large monsters. It has a razor-sharp tip that retains its strength after forging.

item.name: Dodogama Scale+
item.description: Rare Dodogama material. Mostly obtained by carving. Broadly used for many purposes.

item.name: Dodogama Hide+
item.description: Rare Dodogama material. Mostly obtained as a reward. Supple, used to craft gear.

item.name: Dodogama Jaw
item.description: Rare Dodogama material. Obtained by breaking its head. Unusual and difficult to handle.

item.name: Dodogama Talon
item.description: Rare Dodogama material. Obtained by breaking its forelegs. Heavy, used to craft armor.

item.name: Dodogama Tail
item.description: Rare Dodogama material. Obtained by carving its severed tail. Tough, used in many weapons.

name: Great Girros
description:
Um monstro que busca refeições trazidas das Terras Corais.
Ele atua como o líder alfa de uma matilha de Girros e ostenta presas gigantes que paralisam suas presas.

ailments.name: Paralysis
ailments.description: Paralysis renders the hunter or monster immobilized and susceptible to increased damage for the duration. Hunters can unparalyzed if they are hit.

name: Kirin
description:
Kirin são tão raramente avistados que pouco se sabe sobre sua ecologia. Dizem que eles se envolvem em pura eletricidade quando são provocados.
Foi confirmado que o raio com o qual um Kirin se cobre endurece sua pele. A chave para caçar um Kirin está em escaloná-lo, usando armas Elderseal e protegendo-se e evitando seus ataques relâmpagos.

ailments.name: Paralysis
ailments.description: Paralysis renders the hunter or monster immobilized and susceptible to increased damage for the duration. Hunters can unparalyzed if they are hit.

ailments.name: Thunderblight
ailments.description: Thunderblight increases the chance of being stunned.

items.name: Nulberry
items.description: A mysterious berry that cures various blights.

item.name: Lightcrystal
item.description: A precious and extremely hard substance with a faint glow. Sometimes used for crafting tools.

item.name: Novacrystal
item.description: High quality Lightcrystal. Highly coveted for its rarity, it's used for only the finest of metalworking.

item.name: Elder Dragon Bone
item.description: A bone from an elder dragon. It exudes the great majesty of the beast that bore it.

item.name: Elder Dragon Blood
item.description: Contains an unknown compound. The object of much scholarly research.

item.name: Kirin Hide
item.description: Kirin material. Mostly obtained by carving. Broadly used for many purposes.

item.name: Kirin Tail
item.description: Kirin material. Mostly obtained as a reward. Compatible with thunder element.

item.name: Kirin Mane
item.description: Kirin material. Mostly obtained by carving. Highly thunder-resistant, used to craft gear.

item.name: Kirin Thunderhorn
item.description: Kirin material. Obtain by breaking its horn. Grants thunder element properties.

item.name: Kirin Hide+
item.description: Rare Kirin material. Mostly obtained by carving. Broadly used for many purposes.

item.name: Kirin Thundertail
item.description: Rare Kirin material. Mostly obtained as a reward. Compatible with thunder element.

item.name: Kirin Azure Horn
item.description: Rare Kirin material. Obtain by breaking its horn. Grants thunder element properties.

item.name: Dragon Treasure
item.description: A shiny rock that elder dragons like to collect. (Account Item)

name: Kulve Taroth
description: Um Dragão Ancião que se protege com uma camada de metal brilhante. Sua ecologia e pelagem diferem com cada aspecto, daí a necessidade de uma investigação aprofundada. Uma investigação exaustiva é necessária para quebrar os gigantescos chifres folheados a ouro de Kulve Taroth. Persiga o monstro para aprender mais sobre ele. Reúna rastros e recrute caçadores para ajudá-lo a aprofundar sua investigação.

ailments.name: Fireblight
ailments.description: Fireblight causes damage over time, and negates regular health recovery.

items.name: Nulberry
items.description: A mysterious berry that cures various blights.

name: Kushala Daora
description: Um dragão ancião que se protege contra ventos violentos, impedindo qualquer um de se aproximar dele. Sua pele consiste em escamas duras e metálicas.

ailments.name: Stun
ailments.description: Stun renders the target inactive, and sometimes causes them to fall over.

name: Lavasioth
description: Lavasioth utiliza lava derretida como armadura. Eles são extremamente agressivos e atacarão sem preconceitos até que a ameaça seja eliminada.

ailments.name: Fireblight
ailments.description: Fireblight causes damage over time, and negates regular health recovery.

items.name: Nulberry
items.description: A mysterious berry that cures various blights.

name: Legiana
description: O monstro máximo das Terras Altas de Coral, cuja dieta consiste principalmente de Raphinos. Ele emite um vento gelado de seu corpo, que prejudica a capacidade de fuga de sua presa.

ailments.name: Iceblight
ailments.description: Iceblight causes stamina usage to increase when performing actions.

items.name: Nulberry
items.description: A mysterious berry that cures various blights.

name: Lunastra
description: Uma rara fêmea de Dragão Ancião que cobre o ar com poeira azul quente. Relatos de que ela viajou com seu companheiro, Teostra, ainda não foram confirmados.

ailments.name: Fireblight
ailments.description: Fireblight causes damage over time, and negates regular health recovery.

items.name: Nulberry
items.description: A mysterious berry that cures various blights.

name: Nergigante
description: Um terrível dragão ancião que aparece quando outros anciões estão nas proximidades. A sua propensão para a destruição está bem documentada.

name: Odogaron
description: Um monstro terrível que vasculha o Vale Podre em busca de carniça. Sua natureza altamente agressiva significa que qualquer coisa, seja monstro ou homem, é uma refeição em potencial.

ailments.name: Bleeding
ailments.description: Bleeding causes damage when performing certain actions, such as running, dodging, or attacking.

items.name: Well-done Steak
items.description: Provides a moderate boost to your stamina and keeps it at max for a longer period. Meat done right!

items.name: Astera Jerky
items.description: Juicy, dried meat made by Astera's chef. Boosts natural healing and cures bleeding.

items.name: Sushifish Scale
items.description: A scale from a Sushifish. Eat to restore a small amount of health. Also works to treat bleeding.

name: Paolumu
description: Paolumu se delicia com ovos encontrados em Coral Highlands. Eles são capazes de se impulsionar pelo ar usando bolsas únicas em seus corpos e atacar com suas caudas extremamente duras.

ailments.name: Wind Pressure
ailments.description: Wind pressure causes the hunter to brace against powerful winds, causing temporarily imobility.

name: Radobaan
description: Um gigantesco wyvern bruto que come os ossos de carcaças encontradas no Vale Podre, usando alguns deles como armadura. Ele também rola em forma de bola como forma de ataque e transporte.

ailments.name: Sleep
ailments.description: Sleep renders the hunter or monster inactive and susceptible to increased damage, but only for the first hit, as it will then wake them up.

items.name: Energy Drink
items.description: A Guild-approved beverage that boosts your stamina. Helps shake off sleep, too!

name: Rathalos
description: O monstro máximo da Floresta Antiga, também conhecido como o "Rei dos Céus". Um serpe feroz que ataca os invasores, atacando com suas garras venenosas e seu hálito ardente.

ailments.name: Fireblight
ailments.description: Fireblight causes damage over time, and negates regular health recovery.

items.name: Nulberry
items.description: A mysterious berry that cures various blights.

ailments.name: Poison
ailments.description: Poison slowly drains the target's health.

items.name: Antidote
items.description: A cure for poison.

items.name: Herbal Medicine
items.description: Removes all traces of poison and restores a slight amount of health.

ailments.name: Stun
ailments.description: Stun renders the target inactive, and sometimes causes them to fall over.

name: Rathian
description: Uma wyvern conhecida como a “Rainha da Terra”. Predador terrestre, domina suas presas com cauda venenosa e pernas poderosas.

ailments.name: Fireblight
ailments.description: Fireblight causes damage over time, and negates regular health recovery.

items.name: Nulberry
items.description: A mysterious berry that cures various blights.

ailments.name: Poison
ailments.description: Poison slowly drains the target's health.

items.name: Antidote
items.description: A cure for poison.

items.name: Herbal Medicine
items.description: Removes all traces of poison and restores a slight amount of health.

name: Pink Rathian
description: Uma subespécie com escamas rosa vibrantes. Os Rathians Rosa manejam suas caudas tóxicas com mais habilidade do que os Rathians normais, enfraquecendo a presa com veneno antes de avançar para matá-la.

ailments.name: Fireblight
ailments.description: Fireblight causes damage over time, and negates regular health recovery.

items.name: Nulberry
items.description: A mysterious berry that cures various blights.

ailments.name: Poison
ailments.description: Poison slowly drains the target's health.

items.name: Antidote
items.description: A cure for poison.

items.name: Herbal Medicine
items.description: Removes all traces of poison and restores a slight amount of health.

name: Teostra
description: Um dragão ancião brutal envolto em chamas que cospe fogo ardente. Os Teostra são de natureza tão feroz e mortal que a Guilda monitora de perto seus movimentos.

ailments.name: Blastblight
ailments.description: Blastblight will cause a damaging explosion after a certain amount of time has passed, or upon sustaining a heavy impact.

ailments.name: Fireblight
ailments.description: Fireblight causes damage over time, and negates regular health recovery.

items.name: Nulberry
items.description: A mysterious berry that cures various blights.

name: Tzitzi-Ya-Ku
description: Este estranho monstro cega presas e inimigos com um órgão pulsante especial perto de sua cabeça. Em seguida, ele usa suas pernas fortes para desferir golpes finais.

ailments.name: Stun
ailments.description: Stun renders the target inactive, and sometimes causes them to fall over.

name: Uragaan
description: Grandes Wyverns Brutos que se alimentam de minério, usando suas poderosas mandíbulas para transformar rocha sólida em pó. Eles são conhecidos por confrontar Lavasioths em disputas territoriais.

ailments.name: Fireblight
ailments.description: Fireblight causes damage over time, and negates regular health recovery.

items.name: Nulberry
items.description: A mysterious berry that cures various blights.

ailments.name: Sleep
ailments.description: Sleep renders the hunter or monster inactive and susceptible to increased damage, but only for the first hit, as it will then wake them up.

items.name: Energy Drink
items.description: A Guild-approved beverage that boosts your stamina. Helps shake off sleep, too!

name: Vaal Hazak
description: Um grotesco Dragão Ancião, que habita a parte mais profunda do Vale Podre. Ele usa o vapor fatal do vale no que parece ser uma relação simbiótica.

ailments.name: Effluvial Buildup
ailments.description: Effluvial buildup causes damage over time, and eventually cuts your maximum health in half if ignored for too long.

items.name: Nulberry
items.description: A mysterious berry that cures various blights.

skills.name: Effluvial Expert
skills.description: Nullifies or reduces environmental damage in the Rotten Vale.

skills.name: Effluvia Resistance
skills.description: Gain a resistance to effluvial buildup.

name: Xeno'jiiva
description: PESQUISA. Nível de ameaça desconhecido.

ailments.name: Dragonblight
ailments.description: Dragonblight causes your weapon's elemental properties are nullified.

items.name: Nulberry
items.description: A mysterious berry that cures various blights.

ailments.name: Fireblight
ailments.description: Fireblight causes damage over time, and negates regular health recovery.

items.name: Nulberry
items.description: A mysterious berry that cures various blights.

name: Zorah Magdaros
description: Um dragão ancião que surge da terra como um vulcão. Para onde vai e porquê, a Comissão de Investigação ainda não descobriu.

ailments.name: Fireblight
ailments.description: Fireblight causes damage over time, and negates regular health recovery.

items.name: Nulberry
items.description: A mysterious berry that cures various blights.

name: Leshen
description: Habitando nas profundezas da floresta, essas criaturas usam sua magia inata para controlar toda a flora e fauna de seu território.

ailments.name: Bleeding
ailments.description: Bleeding causes damage when performing certain actions, such as running, dodging, or attacking.

items.name: Well-done Steak
items.description: Provides a moderate boost to your stamina and keeps it at max for a longer period. Meat done right!

items.name: Astera Jerky
items.description: Juicy, dried meat made by Astera's chef. Boosts natural healing and cures bleeding.

items.name: Sushifish Scale
items.description: A scale from a Sushifish. Eat to restore a small amount of health. Also works to treat bleeding.

name: Ancient Leshen
description: Um velho Leshen que chegou através de um portal para assumir o controle da Floresta Antiga. Às vezes reverenciado como uma divindade indígena.

ailments.name: Bleeding
ailments.description: Bleeding causes damage when performing certain actions, such as running, dodging, or attacking.

items.name: Well-done Steak
items.description: Provides a moderate boost to your stamina and keeps it at max for a longer period. Meat done right!

items.name: Astera Jerky
items.description: Juicy, dried meat made by Astera's chef. Boosts natural healing and cures bleeding.

items.name: Sushifish Scale
items.description: A scale from a Sushifish. Eat to restore a small amount of health. Also works to treat bleeding.

name: Safi'jiiva
description: A forma adulta de Xeno'jiiva. Ele absorve energia do ambiente para se curar e mudar o ecossistema.

ailments.name: Dragonblight
ailments.description: Dragonblight causes your weapon's elemental properties are nullified.

items.name: Nulberry
items.description: A mysterious berry that cures various blights.

ailments.name: Fireblight
ailments.description: Fireblight causes damage over time, and negates regular health recovery.

items.name: Nulberry
items.description: A mysterious berry that cures various blights.

name: Stygian Zinogre
description: Tem uma relação simbiótica com os Insetos Dracófagos, que libera como balas. Torna-se ainda mais perigoso quando coberto de luz.

ailments.name: Dragonblight
ailments.description: Dragonblight causes your weapon's elemental properties are nullified.

items.name: Nulberry
items.description: A mysterious berry that cures various blights.

name: Rajang
description: Uma criatura ultra-agressiva contra a qual poucos têm chance de sobreviver. Ostenta braços poderosos que dão um soco e ficam dourados quando estão com raiva.

ailments.name: Thunderblight
ailments.description: Thunderblight increases the chance of being stunned.

items.name: Nulberry
items.description: A mysterious berry that cures various blights.

name: Viper Tobi-Kadachi
description: A cauda desta subespécie secreta uma toxina enquanto suas presas paralisam a presa. Também pode planar sem subir em árvores.

ailments.name: Paralysis
ailments.description: Paralysis renders the hunter or monster immobilized and susceptible to increased damage for the duration. Hunters can unparalyzed if they are hit.

ailments.name: Poison
ailments.description: Poison slowly drains the target's health.

items.name: Antidote
items.description: A cure for poison.

items.name: Herbal Medicine
items.description: Removes all traces of poison and restores a slight amount of health.

name: Namielle
description: Diz-se que um Dragão Ancião é capaz de comandar a água e usá-la como escudo. Embora muito poucos avistamentos tenham sido relatados, eles mencionam “água explodindo” e “luzes brilhantes”. Sua existência permanece envolta em mistério.

ailments.name: Thunderblight
ailments.description: Thunderblight increases the chance of being stunned.

items.name: Nulberry
items.description: A mysterious berry that cures various blights.

ailments.name: Waterblight
ailments.description: Waterblight slows down stamina recovery rate.

items.name: Nulberry
items.description: A mysterious berry that cures various blights.

name: Zinogre
description: Relâmpagos percorrem o pelo e o revestimento exclusivo deste wyvern com presas. É mais mortal em seu estado sobrecarregado.

ailments.name: Thunderblight
ailments.description: Thunderblight increases the chance of being stunned.

items.name: Nulberry
items.description: A mysterious berry that cures various blights.

name: Ebony Odogaron
description: Esta subespécie de Odogaron está sempre à espreita de sua próxima refeição e é frequentemente vista carregando presas frescas na boca. Os relatórios indicam que ele entra em frenesi ao comer.

ailments.name: Bleeding
ailments.description: Bleeding causes damage when performing certain actions, such as running, dodging, or attacking.

items.name: Well-done Steak
items.description: Provides a moderate boost to your stamina and keeps it at max for a longer period. Meat done right!

ailments.description: Dragonblight causes your weapon's elemental properties are nullified.

items.name: Nulberry
items.description: A mysterious berry that cures various blights.

name: Banbaro
description: Um monstro com dois chifres gigantes, como uma parede de tijolos em movimento. Ele ataca ameaças enquanto cava seus enormes chifres no chão, às vezes pegando árvores inteiras pelo caminho.

ailments.name: Iceblight
ailments.description: Iceblight causes stamina usage to increase when performing actions.

items.name: Nulberry
items.description: A mysterious berry that cures various blights.

ailments.name: Waterblight
ailments.description: Waterblight slows down stamina recovery rate.

items.name: Nulberry
items.description: A mysterious berry that cures various blights.

name: Beotodus
description: Um wyvern piscino que usa a barbatana afiada em sua cabeça para cortar o solo congelado, nadando livremente pela neve. Muitas vezes pode ser visto jogando neve em suas presas usando as nadadeiras das pernas.

ailments.name: Iceblight
ailments.description: Iceblight causes stamina usage to increase when performing actions.

items.name: Nulberry
items.description: A mysterious berry that cures various blights.

description: Um wyvern voador coberto de pelo preto como breu. É extremamente ágil, principalmente no solo, movendo-se com rajadas explosivas de velocidade.
name: Nargacuga

ailments.name: Bleeding
ailments.description: Bleeding causes damage when performing certain actions, such as running, dodging, or attacking.

items.name: Well-done Steak

items.name: Sushifish Scale
items.description: A scale from a Sushifish. Eat to restore a small amount of health. Also works to treat bleeding.

name: Velkhana
description: Um dragão ancião com o poder de congelar tudo em seu caminho. Segundo a lenda, ele pode controlar o frio e usar seu hálito gelado para conjurar enormes torres de gelo do nada.

ailments.name: Iceblight
ailments.description: Iceblight causes stamina usage to increase when performing actions.

items.name: Nulberry
items.description: A mysterious berry that cures various blights.

name: Tigrex
description: Um wyvern voador saído da pré-história, conhecido por seu rugido ensurdecedor e pernas poderosas que impulsionam seu ataque avassalador.

ailments.name: Iceblight
ailments.description: Iceblight causes stamina usage to increase when performing actions.

items.name: Nulberry
items.description: A mysterious berry that cures various blights.

skills.description: Nullifies or reduces environmental damage in the Rotten Vale.

skills.name: Effluvia Resistance
skills.description: Gain a resistance to effluvial buildup.

name: Shrieking Legiana
description: Uma variante Legiana envolta em geada branca. Ele é especializado em congelar presas com o poderoso frio que emite e depois descer para atacá-las de cima.

ailments.name: Iceblight
ailments.description: Iceblight causes stamina usage to increase when performing actions.

items.name: Nulberry
items.description: A mysterious berry that cures various blights.

name: Barioth
description: ele é um wyvern voador branco como a neve com enormes presas encontrado na tundra congelada. Ele usa as patas dianteiras e a cauda para atravessar o gelo com facilidade.

ailments.name: Iceblight
ailments.description: Iceblight causes stamina usage to increase when performing actions.

items.name: Nulberry
items.description: A mysterious berry that cures various blights.

name: Glavenus
description: Um serpe bruto que empunha sua pesada cauda azul como uma lâmina. Ele fica mais quente e mais intenso a cada golpe até ficar vermelho.

ailments.name: Fireblight
ailments.description: Fireblight causes damage over time, and negates regular health recovery.

items.name: Nulberry
items.description: A mysterious berry that cures various blights.

name: Brachydios
description: Este wyvern bruto azul-marinho usa sua saliva para preparar a gosma pegajosa que cobre seus enormes braços, tornando-o altamente explosivo.

ailments.name: Blastscourge
ailments.description: goes terribly kaboom

name: Fulgur Anjanath
description: A cada ataque, esta subespécie Anjanath se fortalece com eletricidade que carrega em suas mandíbulas e membrana dorsal.

ailments.name: Thunderblight
ailments.description: Thunderblight increases the chance of being stunned.

items.name: Nulberry
items.description: A mysterious berry that cures various blights.

name: Acidic Glavenus
description: Uma nova subespécie do feroz Glavenus, o Acidic Glavenus apresenta uma cauda coberta de enxofre. Encontrado apenas nas áreas apodrecidas do Novo Mundo, um fluido corrosivo se cristalizou em sua cauda, ​​borrifando ácido a cada golpe que pode aplicar um debuff àqueles que forem pegos nele.

ailments.name: Defense Down
ailments.description: Some monsters may inflict a status that lowers a hunter's defense. Lasts for a certain period of time but can also be cured with defense-increasing items.

items.name: Armorskin
items.description: Boosts your defense by turning your skin as hard as rock.

items.name: Mega Armorskin
items.description: Boosts your defense even more than a regular armorskin.

name: Ruiner Nergigante
description: Inúmeras batalhas apenas fortaleceram esta variante do Nergigante. Além de curar, seus espinhos ficam mais resistentes à medida que perde saúde.

ailments.name: Bleeding
ailments.description: Bleeding causes damage when performing certain actions, such as running, dodging, or attacking.

ailments.description: Poison but ultra hardcore

ailments.name: Paralysis
ailments.description: Paralysis renders the hunter or monster immobilized and susceptible to increased damage for the duration. Hunters can unparalyzed if they are hit.

name: Coral Pukei-Pukei
description: Um pássaro wyvern que armazena água dentro de seu corpo, fortalecido pela vida vegetal que consome. Quando ameaçado, pode expelir um jato poderoso pela boca ou cauda.

ailments.name: Waterblight
ailments.description: Waterblight slows down stamina recovery rate.

items.name: Nulberry
items.description: A mysterious berry that cures various blights.

name: Nightshade Paolomu
description: Uma subespécie Paolumu capaz de adormecer a presa. Ele produz um poderoso gás sedativo armazenado em seu saco de garganta que pode ser expelido e espalhado para nocautear inimigos incautos.

name: Yian Garuga
description: Um pássaro wyvern de temperamento explosivo, marcado por suas escamas pretas e duras e sua crina impressionante. Ele ataca com seu bico distinto.

description: Um misterioso dragão ancião capaz de manipular a própria terra. As vibrações das pontas das asas remodelam a terra, impedindo o equilíbrio dos caçadores.

ailments.name: Stun
ailments.description: Stun renders the target inactive, and sometimes causes them to fall over.

name: Savage Deviljho
description: Uma variante mutante do Deviljho, enlouquecida por sua fome avassaladora. Ele tentará se alimentar de tudo que vê.

name: Scarred Yian Garuga

name: Rajang
description: Uma criatura ultra-agressiva contra a qual poucos têm chance de sobreviver. Ostenta braços poderosos que dão um soco e ficam dourados quando estão com raiva.

ailments.name: Thunderblight

name: Safi'jiiva
description: A forma adulta de Xeno'jiiva. Ele absorve energia do ambiente para se curar e mudar o ecossistema.

description: Uma variante de Brachydios que é muito maior que a espécie normal. A gosma em seu corpo será ativada com o tempo e detonará.

name: Furious Rajang
description: Uma variante Rajang coberta de pêlo dourado. Utiliza ataques severos à distância e baseados em paredes. Ele entra em um estado dourado brilhante quando enfurecido.
